channel.title: LF AI RSS

item.title: Briefing with LLM on Tue, 08 Aug 2023 10:45:53
item.description: The following content is a collection of news articles from various sources, including 36Kr and TechCrunch. These articles cover a range of topics, including technology startups, medical research, financial markets, and entertainment. Some notable articles include Etleap's software engineering job opening in London or San Francisco, the elegant molecular mechanisms used by malignant melanoma to evade immune responses, and the financial struggles faced by Starbucks due to increased competition from Luckin Coffee. Other topics include recent funding rounds for various startups, updates on Chinese real estate companies, and fluctuations in stock markets.
